Senior Officer / Corporate Banking Department - Non Japanese Section
Senior Officer / Corporate Banking Department - Non Japanese Section
Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation , Hanoi Branch
11th floor, Pacific Place, 83B Ly Thuong Kiet Street, Hanoi

* Key Responsibilities and Duties: - Covering projects of Corporate Banking Department, Non - Japanese section; - Establishing, maintaining and further developing business relationship with customer to increase profit; - Performing credit analysis and write up credit application; - Following up with customer's situation to approach new business opportunities based on customer's demand; - Ensuring the completion of Bank's procedures in all transactions.

** Job Requirements: - University graduates in Finance and Banking; - Obtaining at least 05 years of experience in Banking field, especially corporate banking; experience in trade finance promotion for Multiple National Companies and Vietnamese Companies are preferable; - Strong skills of negotiation and presentation; - Willing to work in a team as well as work independently; - Willing to travel and work under pressure; - Being a goal focused and customer oriented person; - Fluent in English and computer; * We offer dynamic working environment, advancement opportunities and competitive remuneration for successful candidates. * All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence. Applications including detailed resume with recent photograph, present and expected salaries, and contact details are invited to send to below address before 28 August 2014: SUMITOMO MITSUI BANKING CORPORATION - HANOI BRANCH 11th floor, Pacific Place, 83B Ly Thuong Kiet Street, Hanoi

and.attribute: Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation (SMBC) was formed from the 2001 merger of Sumitomo Bank and Sakura Bank. The merger of 2 banks with four hundred years of history created one of the largest Japanese bank with 564 domestic branches and more than 41 world-wide branches and representative offices. SMBC provides a host of financial services including commercial and investment banking, credit-related services as well as investment advisory and securities services along with research, data processing, and management consulting. SMBC officially opened the Hanoi Branch in December 2008. We offer a dynamic working enviroment, advancement opportunities, as well as competitive salary and benefits to sucessful candidates.
